name: TecSynt Solutions
description:
TecSynt is an Eastern Europe Research & Development company that develops world-class Blockchain, Web and Mobile software for bold entrepreneurs from all over the world. We build complex solutions from scratch and we are led by passion as we believe that there is no other way to create the exceptional products. 
 
Tech Stack includes but is not limited to: iOS/Android, Python, Node.js, JavaScript, AngularJS, ReactJS, Java, Erlang, KYC, Blockchain Smart Contracts, etc.​​​​​​​
Having a successful history of working hand in hand with entrepreneurs from all around the globe, we're driven, determined, responsible and reliable. TecSynt Solutions always offers clients Partnership & Transparency & Quality​​​​​​​!
